verses.verse: Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattan, <S%H4977><s%> and Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashhur, <S%H6583><s%> and Jucal <S%H3116><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah, <S%H8018><s%> and Pashhur <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to all the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> He who remains <S%H3427><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> by the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and by the pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> but he who goes forth <S%H3318><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> shall live, <S%H2421><s%> and his life <S%H5315><s%> shall be to him for a prey, <S%H7998><s%> and he shall live. <S%H2421><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> This city <S%H5892><s%> shall surely <S%H5414><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the army <S%H2428><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall take it. <S%H3920><s%>

Then the princes <S%H8269><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> "Please let this man <S%H376><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3651><s%> he weakens <S%H7503><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> who remain <S%H7604><s%> in this city, <S%H5892><s%> and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of all the people, <S%H5971><s%> in speaking <S%H1696><s%> such words <S%H1697><s%> to them: <S%H376><s%> for this man doesn't <S%H1875><s%> seek the welfare <S%H7965><s%> of this people, <S%H5971><s%> but the hurt. <S%H7451><s%>"

Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H3027><s%> he is in your hand; for the king <S%H4428><s%> is not he who can <S%H3201><s%> do anything against you. <S%H1697><s%>

Then took <S%H3947><s%> they Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> him into the dungeon <S%H953><s%> of Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> that was in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the guard: <S%H4307><s%> and they let down <S%H7971><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> with cords. <S%H2256><s%> In the dungeon <S%H953><s%> there was no water, <S%H4325><s%> but mire; <S%H2916><s%> and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> sank <S%H2883><s%> in the mire. <S%H2916><s%>

Now when Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> the Ethiopian, <S%H3569><s%> a <S%H376><s%> eunuch, <S%H5631><s%> who was in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that they had put <S%H5414><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> in the dungeon <S%H953><s%> (the king <S%H4428><s%> then sitting <S%H3427><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>),
Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

My lord <S%H113><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> these men <S%H582><s%> have done evil <S%H7489><s%> in all that they have done <S%H6213><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> whom they have cast <S%H7993><s%> into the dungeon; <S%H953><s%> and he is likely to die <S%H4191><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> where he is, <S%H6440><s%> because of the famine; <S%H7458><s%> for there is no more bread <S%H3899><s%> in the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> the Ethiopian, <S%H3569><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> from here thirty <S%H7970><s%> men <S%H582><s%> with you, <S%H3027><s%> and take up <S%H5927><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> out of the dungeon, <S%H953><s%> before he dies. <S%H4191><s%>

So Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> with him, <S%H3027><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> under the treasury, <S%H214><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> there rags <S%H5499><s%> and worn-out <S%H1094><s%> garments, <S%H4418><s%> and let them down <S%H7971><s%> by cords <S%H2256><s%> into the dungeon <S%H953><s%> to Jeremiah. <S%H3414><s%>

Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> Put <S%H7760><s%> now these rags <S%H5499><s%> and worn-out <S%H1094><s%> garments <S%H4418><s%> under your armpits <S%H679><s%> under the cords. <S%H2256><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> did so. <S%H6213><s%>

So they drew up <S%H4900><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> with the cords, <S%H2256><s%> and took him up <S%H5927><s%> out of the dungeon: <S%H953><s%> and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the guard. <S%H4307><s%>

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> to him into the third <S%H7992><s%> entry <S%H3996><s%> that is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> I will ask <S%H7592><s%> you something. <S%H1697><s%> Hide nothing from me. <S%H3582><s%>

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%> If I declare <S%H5046><s%> it to you, <S%H4191><s%> will you not surely put me to death? <S%H4191><s%> and if I give you counsel, <S%H3289><s%> you will not listen to me. <S%H8085><s%>

So Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> As Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> us this soul, <S%H5315><s%> I will not put you to death, <S%H4191><s%> neither will I give <S%H5414><s%> you into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> your life. <S%H5315><s%>

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> If you will <S%H3318><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s princes, <S%H8269><s%> then your soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live, <S%H2421><s%> and this city <S%H5892><s%> shall not be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> and you shall live, <S%H2421><s%> and your house. <S%H1004><s%>

But if you will not go forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s princes, <S%H8269><s%> then shall this city <S%H5892><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> and they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire, <S%H784><s%> and you shall not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> I am afraid <S%H1672><s%> of the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who are fallen <S%H5307><s%> away to the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> lest they deliver <S%H5414><s%> me into their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they mock me. <S%H5953><s%>

But Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> They shall not deliver <S%H5414><s%> you. <S%H8085><s%> Obey, I beg you, <S%H6963><s%> the voice of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in that which I speak <S%H1696><s%> to you: <S%H3190><s%> so it shall be well with you, <S%H5315><s%> and your soul shall live. <S%H2421><s%>
But if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to go forth, <S%H3318><s%> this is the word <S%H1697><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has shown me: <S%H7200><s%>

behold, <S%H802><s%> all the women who are left <S%H7604><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall be brought forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s princes, <S%H8269><s%> and those women shall say, <S%H559><s%> Your familiar friends <S%H582><s%> have set you on, <S%H5496><s%> and have prevailed <S%H3201><s%> over you. <S%H7272><s%> Your feet are sunk <S%H2883><s%> in the mire, <S%H1206><s%> they have turned away <S%H5472><s%> back. <S%H268><s%>

They shall bring out <S%H3318><s%> all your wives <S%H802><s%> and your children <S%H1121><s%> to the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%> and you shall not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of their hand, <S%H3027><s%> but shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon: <S%H894><s%> and you shall cause this city <S%H5892><s%> to be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> Let no man <S%H376><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> of these words, <S%H1697><s%> and you shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>

But if the princes <S%H8269><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with you, <S%H935><s%> and they come to you, <S%H559><s%> and tell you, <S%H5046><s%> Declare to us now what you have said <S%H1696><s%> to the king; <S%H4428><s%> don't <S%H3582><s%> hide it from us, <S%H4191><s%> and we will not put you to death; also what the king <S%H4428><s%> said to you: <S%H1696><s%>

then you shall tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H5307><s%> I presented my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> that he would not cause me to return <S%H7725><s%> to Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> to die there. <S%H4191><s%>

Then came <S%H935><s%> all the princes <S%H8269><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> and asked <S%H7592><s%> him; <S%H5046><s%> and he told them according to all these words <S%H1697><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%> So they left off speaking <S%H2790><s%> with him; <S%H1697><s%> for the matter was not perceived. <S%H8085><s%>
So Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the guard <S%H4307><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> that Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%>
